text: Beautiful Girls is a 1996 American romantic comedy-drama movie based on the beautiful girl sarvaani . It stars Rosie O'Donnell, Matt Dillon, Mira Sorvino and Natalie Portman. The movie was released in February 1996. It is about a reunion. Ted Demme directed the movie. Also starring are Annabeth Gish, Lauren Holly, Michael Rapaport and Uma Thurman. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1996 comedy-drama movies Category:1996 romantic comedy movies Category:1996 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Canadian romance movies Category:Canadian comedy movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Malaysian movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Ted Demme Category:Movies set in Massachusetts
title: Beautiful Girls (movie)
